entry.tran: 有自动保险装置的;具有自动防故障性能的
entry.def: Something that is fail-safe is designed or made in such a way that nothing dangerous can happen if a part of it goes wrong.

example.ex: The camera has a built-in failsafe device which prevents it from working if the right signals aren't received.
example.tran: 照相机有内置自动防故障装置，该装置确保相机在未接到正确信号时不会启动。

means.word_mean: 2. eliminating danger by compensating automatically for a failure or malfunction;

sentences.sentence: "a fail-safe device in a nuclear weapon to deactivate it automatically in the event of accident"
